Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Lucia's M.I.N.D. is shaking violently once again, killing the lights in her surroundings. The Mind Beacon in the distance seems to have grown dimmer, too."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's happening again... I need to leave now. I can still stop the merge!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pitch darkness returns, but it does not stop Lucia.'}
{3: 'Shards of memory hover in the air, seemingly luring her to reach out for them.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The memories before the divergence point are back...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She reaches out for the shard in front of her, but she stops as she hesitates and looks up at the Mind Beacon.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It could be a clue, or it could be a trap to stall me...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lucia feels much safer seeing the Mind Beacon's soothing light. She reaches out for the shard."}
{3: "Then, Lucia's childhood voice can be heard coming from the depths of the abyss..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz103.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Once upon a time, an evil king was all by himself. He had the elixir of life, but he never shared it with anyone.'}
{3: "In the faded memory, Luna is sitting in Lucia's arms and listening to her reading a story from a magazine she found.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'And war broke out one day. A lot of people died.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'He went to his people and shouted, "I can share my elixir of life with you."'}
{3: "Lucia holds on to Luna's hand as she reads the book, rubbing the back of her hand."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Some people said no because they didn't believe him, but some said yes because they were desperate."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'But most of the people who drank the elixir died. Those who survived had scales and horns growing out of their body. They looked like the evil king now.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "People were angry, thinking they'd been tricked. They stopped fighting amongst themselves and tried to fight the evil king and those who'd turned into monsters."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Why did they try to fight those who'd turned into monsters?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Because those people became immortal monsters. The humans were afraid that they wouldn't be able to fight the monsters if they ever got bullied by them."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "Why didn't the humans just drink the elixir themselves?"}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because they were afraid that the elixir would either kill them or turn them into monsters.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: '...So what happened next?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The leader of the humans caught one of the monsters. "If you can poison the evil king\'s drink and kill him, I shall reward you properly," the leader politely said to the monster.'}

{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The monster happily agreed. After the monster passed the poisoned drink to the lonely king, he drank it all with a smile on his face, because it'd been so long since he last spent time with anyone."}
{3: 'Lucia picks up the blanket on the floor and covers Luna with it.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Did the evil king die?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'He did, and the humans captured all the monsters. The world was all peaceful again with just humans in it. How wonderful.'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: "But how is it wonderful? Wasn't it the humans who started the war? If they hadn't, the evil king wouldn't have decided to hand out his elixir."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's true, but that's how it goes in the story."}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Poor evil king...'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why? A lot of people died because of his elixir!'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'But he only handed out his elixir because the war had killed a lot of people, no?'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Should he just sit around and hope the world would get better?'}
{3: "Lucia puts down the magazine. She pats Luna on the back as she thinks about Luna's question."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But that's still not a good reason for the evil king to go around handing out his evil elixir. There has to be a different solution!"}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'Like what?'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I don't know, but there has to be!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "Lucia's M.I.N.D. is now shaking violently again, sending the shards of memories flying in the air."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Luna', 3: "People are always afraid of those different from themselves. They try to get rid of them if they can't use them.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Luna', 3: 'So I made myself a promise... I wanted to build a paradise for us, an eternal paradise for just the two of us...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the red lights return, Lucia can hear something speaking to herâ€”something that looks like Luna.'}
{3: 'A paradise for us... with all the monsters...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory257.png'}
{3: 'The Mind Beacon is now flashing rapidly, as if calling for Lucia.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "These memories won't change a thing no matter how much time I spend looking at them. I should go now. They're waiting for me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The pitch darkness clears up. Right above the abyss, a star shines brighter than ever.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Target found. I'm moving on.", 4: '1'}
